summary: This is an email chain from July 25, 2019, forwarding a New York Daily News breaking news report that Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his jail cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan, with marks on his neck suggesting a possible suicide attempt.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the news report; found semi-conscious in his jail cell with neck injuries possibly from a suicide attempt.

events.title: Epstein found injured in jail cell
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found semi-conscious in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan with marks on his neck that may have been self-inflicted.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, Manhattan, New York, NY
New York Plaza, New York, NY 10004
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his jail cell on or around July 24, 2019.
The incident occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan.
Epstein was found semi-conscious with marks on his neck that may have been self-inflicted, suggesting a possible suicide attempt.
The information was reported by NBC News and disseminated via the New York Daily News breaking news email.
The document is an email chain dated July 25, 2019, forwarding this breaking news report.
